member.name: M:Retyped.signalr.SignalR2.Hub.Proxy.on(System.String,Retyped.signalr.SignalR2.Hub.Proxy.onFn)
member.summary: Wires up a callback to be invoked when a invocation request is received from the server hub.
member.param: The name of the hub event to register the callback for.
The callback to be invoked.

member.name: M:Retyped.signalr.SignalR2.Hub.Proxy.off(System.String,Retyped.signalr.SignalR2.Hub.Proxy.offFn)
member.summary: Removes the callback invocation request from the server hub for the given event name.
member.param: The name of the hub event to unregister the callback for.
The callback to be invoked.

member.name: M:Retyped.signalr.SignalR2.Hub.Proxy.invoke(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Invokes a server hub method with the given arguments.
member.param: The name of the server hub method.

member.name: M:Retyped.signalr.SignalR2.Hub.Connection.createHubProxy(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new proxy object for the given hub connection that can be used to invoke methods on server hubs and handle client method invocation requests from the server.
member.param: The name of the hub on the server to create the proxy for.

member.summary: Creates a new hub connection.

[Optional] Settings to use when creating the hubConnection.

member.summary: This should be set by the server in response to the negotiate request (30s default)

member.summary: This should be set by the server in response to the negotiate request

member.name: P:Retyped.signalr.SignalR2.Connection.keepAliveWarnAt
member.summary: Warn user of slow connection if we breach the X% mark of the keep alive timeout

member.summary: Adds a callback that will be invoked before anything is sent over the connection

member.summary: Sends data over the connection

member.summary: Adds a callback that will be invoked after anything is received over the connection

member.name: M:Retyped.signalr.SignalR2.Connection.isCrossDomain(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if url is cross domain
member.param: The base URL

member.name: M:Retyped.signalr.SignalR2.Connection.isCrossDomain(System.String,Bridge.Union{Retyped.dom.Location,Retyped.signalr.SignalR2.SimplifyLocation})
member.summary: Checks if url is cross domain
member.param: The base URL
An optional argument to compare the URL against, if not specified it will be set to window.location. If specified it must contain a protocol and a host property.

member.name: M:Retyped.signalr.SignalR.Self(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new SignalR connection for the given url
member.param: The URL of the long polling endpoint

member.name: M:Retyped.signalr.SignalR.Self(System.String,Bridge.Union{System.String,Retyped.Primitive.Object})
member.summary: Creates a new SignalR connection for the given url
member.param: The URL of the long polling endpoint
[Optional] Custom querystring parameters to add to the connection URL. If an object, every non-function member will be added to the querystring. If a string, it's added to the QS as specified.

member.summary: Creates a new SignalR connection for the given url

member.name: M:Retyped.signalr.SignalR.Self(System.String,Bridge.Union{System.String,Retyped.Primitive.Object},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new SignalR connection for the given url
member.param: The URL of the long polling endpoint
[Optional] Custom querystring parameters to add to the connection URL. If an object, every non-function member will be added to the querystring. If a string, it's added to the QS as specified.
[Optional] A flag indicating whether connection logging is enabled to the browser console/log. Defaults to false.
